.class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlSingle extends System.ValueType implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.IComparable, class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Docs.summary: Represents a floating point number within the range of -3.40E +38 through 3.40E +38 to be stored in or retrieved from a database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Maps to the SQL Server real data type. For more information, see <xref:System.Data.SqlTypes> or SQL Server Books Online.

Docs.returns:
A signed number that indicates the relative values of the instance and the object.
Return Value
Condition
Less than zero
This instance is less than the object.
Zero
This instance is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This instance is greater than the object
-or-
The object is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
